Package it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.goal

Class ObliqueDisposition

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.goal.GoalCard
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.goal.ObliqueDisposition
public class ObliqueDisposition extends GoalCard
The ObliqueDisposition class represents a specific type of goal card where players score points based on oblique arrangements on their game board. It extends GoalCard.

  • Constructor Details

    • ObliqueDisposition

      public ObliqueDisposition(int imageId, int points, Kingdom kingdom, int direction)
      Constructs an ObliqueDisposition goal card with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      imageId - the image ID of the card
      points - the points awarded for achieving this goal
      kingdom - the kingdom associated with this goal
      direction - the direction of the oblique disposition (1 for top-left, -1 for top-right)
